text: Ara etimadera pariksa kare dekhabe ye paryanta na tara bibaha-bayase upanita haya, tarapara yadi tadera madhye bicara-bud'dhi dekhate pa'o tabe tadera dhanasampatti tadera hastarpana karabe, ara ta matratiriktabhabe o tarahuro kare kheye phelo na pache tara bara haye yabe. Ara ye abasthapanna se yena nibrtta thake, ara ye gariba se n'yayasangatabhabe khaka. Tarapara yakhana tomara tadera sampatti tadera phiriye da'o takhana tadera samane saksi dako. Ara hisaba-raksakarupe allah yathesta.
